FuncDef:
The multicast mvpn inter-area-segmented enable command enables the multicast VPN to support segmented tunnels in an inter area network.
The undo multicast mvpn inter-area-segmented enable command disables the multicast VPN from supporting segmented tunnels.
By default, a multicast VPN does not support segmented tunnels.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In an inter-Area network, to enable the NG MVPN to support segmented tunnels, run the multicast mvpn inter-area-segmented enable command.
